author: newsr.in
title: Now, cricket stumped by Shiv Sena's anti-Pak stand - newsR
text: After preventing Pakistan i ghazal maestro Ghulam Ali from performing in the city, the Shiv Sena turned its gaze on cricket. Protesting against a revival of cricketing ties with Pakistan, Sena workers stormed into the headquarters of the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI), disrupting talks between Indian cricket chief ...
